about_the_game:
Ion Fury: Aftershock is the long-waited expansion for the critically acclaimed Ion Fury game developed by Voidpoint and published by the legendary 3D Realms.

The all-new soundtrack album consists of 17 songs composed by Jarkko Rotsten whose previous work on the Ion Fury soundtrack got an "Outstanding achievement in old school composing techniques" award in Game Audio Awards 2020 and it also placed 2nd in Linux GOTY Award 2019.

Ion Fury: Aftershock soundtrack is made by using the familiar oldskool techniques - the most excellent Fast Tracker 2 clone (by 8bitbubsy). The whole 80 minute worth of tracker music was carefully mixed and mastered with modern technology for your ultimate listening pleasure.

Composed, arranged, mixed and mastered by Jarkko Rotsten
